game.title: The Elusive Shipment
game.objective: Recover the stolen weapons for the local militia.
game.description: A significant arms shipment went missing, and Captain Garrison is seeking your assistance to locate and return it.
game.reward: ��金奖励和新型武器装备一套

task.objective: Talk to Captain Riddley about the stolen shipment at the militia headquarters.
task.description: Visit Captain Riddley's office and exchange information on the missing weapons.

task.objective: Examine the warehouse for any signs of tampering or clues.
task.description: Head to the warehouse where the shipment was last seen and investigate thoroughly.

task.objective: Track down the rumored bandits involved in the theft.
task.description: Follow leads and gather evidence before confronting them at their hideout.

task.objective: Rescue the stolen shipment from the bandits' lair.
task.description: Once you find and defeat the bandits, retrieve the weapons from their hideout.

task.objective: Return the recovered shipment to Captain Riddley at the militia headquarters.
task.description: Deliver the recovered goods back to their original destination.
